skillTree.localised_description: Whereby the power of death itself is used to hold back the physical world.
There are any number of mysterious wonders secreted away in the shadows, for those discerning enough to find them.

effects.description: Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 5%

skillTree.localised_description: This Lord of Undeath projects an aura of dominion that can wilt the most iron-willed mortals.
Ulrika has chosen to throw her lot in with her adopted kind, for better or for worse.

effects.description: Diplomatic relations: -5 with all Kislev factions
Diplomatic relations: -10 with all Kislev factions
Diplomatic relations: -15 with all Kislev factions

skillTree.localised_description: The ties of Kislev run deep, and not even the ravages of undeath can unseat them.

effects.description: Diplomatic relations: +10 with all Kislev factions
Diplomatic relations: +20 with all Kislev factions
Diplomatic relations: +30 with all Kislev factions

skillTree.localised_description: Fluttering and flouncing into battle is the way of the weak and self-indulgent. War should be waged Kharneth's way – with pure, unbridled savagery.

effects.description: Melee attack: +10 when fighting against Slaaneshi factions
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Slaaneshi factions

skillTree.localised_description: As skilled with a bow as she is with a sword, Ulrika will rain down arrows upon any too scared to close with her.
Sometimes, there are moments when defense is no longer a priority, and the only thing that matters is getting the kill.
Undefeated since she was 15 years old, Ulrika has long valued a good defense over a strong offense.
Many mortal champions change their attitude when their proud challenge is accepted by a dark creature whose very eyes are the eyes of death…
If anything, this one has an even greater lust for life than they did before their death.

related_attributes.bullet_text: Even when performing the most fatiguing actions, this unit never loses vigour.

skillTree.localised_description: Able to cast off even her own vampiric sire with an act of will, Ulrika shall crumble before no one.
So much of war is an art. Over time and with much practice, combat moves can resemble a series of perfectly-rehearsed dance moves.
This being fights dirty, no honour system applies here!
"Stay in one place, gods-damn you!"
Whether a targeted slice to the throat, or a precision stab to the heart, this one knows how to kill!
"The enemy's fear; their blood spilt in the mud – these are the things that sustain me."
This one doesn't just move in the shadows, they *are* the shadows…
Those who are fleet of foot can reach the enemy faster.
Always on the lookout for an opening or advantage in battle - somewhere to put the knife in…
The harder they hit, the more they commit, the easier it is to strike back.
To look upon this Undead Lord is to witness true and absolute horror!

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.

skillTree.localised_description: The body of a Vampire looks human, but is capable of reactions so fast that even the quickest swordsman would look clumsy in comparison.
You have to get up very early if you want to beat this one; nothing escapes their keen eye and lightning reflexes.
The forest teaches a warrior not only when to fire but where, which makes a bigger difference.
Although precision in missile combat is something that can be learned, this one was born with a high degree of natural talent.
The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

effects.description: Spread Corruption action: Vampiric corruption is increased by an additional 1
Spread Corruption action: Vampiric corruption is increased by an additional 2
Spread Corruption action: Vampiric corruption is increased by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: It is not just the forces of Chaos that can despoil, break and ruin.

effects.description: Damage Building action: Additional 5% damage caused
Damage Building action: Additional 15% damage caused
Damage Building action: Additional 30% damage caused

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of a powerful figure extolling death and blasphemies can bring enemy ranks to their knees.

effects.description: Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -10%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -20%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -40%

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.
Those in the army can find succour or be replenished by the power of this champion.

effects.description: Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 3%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 6%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 9%

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

Undead units cannot be routed, but take damage when their Leadership is broken.
	
	Undead units also have:
	 Fear and Terror Immunity
	
	Undead units may also have their hit points restored by special characters such as the Vampire Counts Necromancer.
This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Born of noble Kislevite stock and later transformed into a vampire, Ulrika still fights for the land of her birth.

effects.description: Melee attack: +10 when fighting against Warriors of Chaos, Norsca and Daemons
Melee attack: +10 when fighting against Skaven
Weapon strength: +20% when fighting against Skaven, Beastmen, Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos, Chaos Dwarfs and Norsca
